Package ca.mcgill.splendorclient.model.cards

Interface Observer

All Known Implementing Classes:
CardColumnView, CardView, Deck, DeckView, MoveManager, TokenPile, TokenPileView, TotalCardCountView, TotalPrestigeCountView, TotalTokenCountView, UserInventory
public interface Observer
Observer interface. Getting pretty crowded. Might have to revisit this in the future.

    • onAction

      Sends a token to observers.
      Parameters:

      default void onAction(boolean increment)
      This is used when adding tokens or removing tokens.
      Parameters:
